headline: Brown & Brown Healthcare Integration Might Change The Case For Investing In Brown & Brown (BRO)
summary: Brown & Brown, Inc. recently declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.165 per share, payable on February 11, 2026, to shareholders of record as of February 4, 2026, and previously announced the creation of Brown & Brown Healthcare, a fully integrated national healthcare practice uniting more than 140 professionals. This integrated healthcare platform positions Brown & Brown to offer end-to-end risk and insurance solutions across the complex healthcare sector, potentially enhancing...

headline: Brown & Brown mourns the passing of Chief Legal Officer Robert Mathis
summary: C. Robert Mathis, IV Robert Mathis - Executive Vice President & Chief Legal Officer, Brown & Brown, Inc. DAYTONA BEACH, Fla., Jan. 26, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- It is with profound sadness that Brown & Brown, Inc. (NYSE: BRO) (“the Company”) announces the passing of Chief Legal Officer, Robert Mathis. A great friend and teammate, Robert was a dynamic leader, an exceptional attorney and keen legal mind. He brought clarity to complexity, steadiness to challenging moments and genuine care to every r
